00029 #include "StreamInterface.h"

00034 enum SVGGColor {
00035     SVGBlack,
00036     SVGBlue,
00037     SVGGreen,
00038     SVGRed,
00039     SVGYellow,
00040     SVGWhite
00041 };
00042 
00043 class SVGGElementInterface {
00044 public:
00045     virtual void Draw(float XFactor, float YFactor, StreamInterface &out) = 0;
00046 
00047     void SetColor(SVGGColor color, StreamInterface &out){
00048         switch (color) {
00049             case SVGBlack:{
00050                 out.Printf("black");
00051             }break;
00052             case SVGBlue:{
00053                 out.Printf("blue");
00054             }break;
00055             case SVGGreen:{
00056                 out.Printf("green");
00057             }break;
00058             case SVGRed:{
00059                 out.Printf("red");
00060             }break;
00061             case SVGYellow:{
00062                 out.Printf("yellow");
00063             }break;
00064             case SVGWhite:{
00065                 out.Printf("white");
00066             }break;
00067         }
00068     }
00069 };
00070 
00071 enum SVGGPointType {
00072     SVGPointDot,
00073     SVGPointCross,
00074     SVGPointStar
00075 };
00076 
00077 class SVGGPoint : public SVGGElementInterface, public LinkedListable {
00078 public:
00079     float                         x;
00080     float                         y;
00081     SVGGPointType                 pointType;
00082     int                           size;
00083     SVGGColor                     color;
00084 
00085 public:
00086     virtual void Draw(float XFactor, float YFactor, StreamInterface &out) {
00087         out.Printf("<circle cx=\"%f\" cy=\"%f\" r=\"%d\" style=\"fill: ", x*XFactor, 50.0 - y*YFactor, size);
00088         SetColor(color, out);         
00089         out.Printf("\"/>\n");
00090     }
00091 };

00097 enum SVGGLineType {
00098     SVGLinePlain,
00099     SVGLineDotted,
00100     SVGLineDashed,
00101 };
00102 
00103 class SVGGLine : public SVGGElementInterface, public LinkedListable {
00104 public:
00105     float                         x1;
00106     float                         y1;
00107     float                         x2;
00108     float                         y2;
00109     int                           lineWidth;
00110     SVGGLineType                  lineType;
00111     SVGGColor                     color;
00112 
00113 public:
00114     virtual void Draw(float XFactor, float YFactor, StreamInterface &out) {
00115         out.Printf("<line x1=\"%f\" y1=\"%f\" x2=\"%f\" y2=\"%f\" stroke=\"", x1*XFactor, 50.0 - y1*YFactor, x2*XFactor, 50.0 - y2*YFactor);
00116         SetColor(color, out); 
00117         out.Printf("\" stroke-width=\"%d\" ", lineWidth);
00118 
00119         switch (lineType) {
00120             case SVGLinePlain: {} break;
00121             case SVGLineDotted: {
00122                 out.Printf("stroke-dasharray=\"%d\"", lineWidth);
00123             } break;
00124             case SVGLineDashed: {
00125                 out.Printf("stroke-dasharray=\"%d\"", 2*lineWidth);
00126             } break;
00127         }
00128 
00129         out.Printf("/>\n");
00130     }
00131 };
00132 
00133 class SVGGRectangle : public SVGGElementInterface, public LinkedListable {
00134 public:
00135     float                         x;
00136     float                         y;
00137     float                         width;
00138     float                         height;
00139     int                           lineWidth;
00140     SVGGLineType                  lineType;
00141     SVGGColor                     lineColor;
00142     SVGGColor                     areaColor;
00143 
00144 public:
00145     virtual void Draw(float XFactor, float YFactor, StreamInterface &out) {
00146         out.Printf("<rect x=\"%f\" y=\"%f\" width=\"%f\" height=\"%f\" ", x*XFactor, 50.0 - y*YFactor, width*XFactor, height*YFactor);
00147         out.Printf("style=\"fill:");
00148         SetColor(areaColor, out);
00149         out.Printf(";stroke:");        
00150         SetColor(lineColor, out);
00151         out.Printf(";stroke-width:%d;", lineWidth);
00152 
00153         switch (lineType) {
00154             case SVGLinePlain: {} break;
00155             case SVGLineDotted: {
00156                 out.Printf(";stroke-dasharray=%d", lineWidth);
00157             } break;
00158             case SVGLineDashed: {
00159                 out.Printf(";stroke-dasharray=%d", 2*lineWidth);
00160             } break;
00161         }
00162 
00163         out.Printf("\"/>\n");
00164     }
00165 };

00168 class SVGGraph : public LinkedListHolder {
00169 private:
00170     float                               maxX;
00171     float                               maxY;
00172 public:
00173     int                                 xSize;
00174     int                                 ySize;
00175 
00176     bool                                grid;
00177     float                               gridDensity;
00178 
00179     bool                                axes;
00180 
00181 
00182 public:
00183     SVGGraph() {
00184         this->Reset();
00185 
00186         xSize               = 500;
00187         ySize               = 500;
00188 
00189         grid                = False;
00190         gridDensity         = 1.0;
00191 
00192         axes                = True;
00193 
00194         maxX                = -1e16;
00195         maxY                = -1e16;
00196     }
00197 
00198     ~SVGGraph() {
00199         LinkedListable* e = this->ListExtract();
00200         while ( e != NULL ) {
00201             delete e;
00202             e = this->ListExtract();
00203         }
00204     }
00205 
00206     void AddPoint(float xCoord, float yCoord, SVGGPointType type, SVGGColor color, int lineWidth) {
00207         SVGGPoint* p = new SVGGPoint;
00208 
00209         p->x          = xCoord;
00210         p->y          = yCoord;
00211         p->pointType  = type;
00212         p->size       = lineWidth;
00213         p->color      = color;
00214 
00215         if (fabs(xCoord) > maxX) maxX = fabs(xCoord);
00216         if (fabs(yCoord) > maxY) maxY = fabs(yCoord);
00217 
00218         this->ListAdd(p);
00219     }
00220 
00221     void AddLine(float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2, SVGGLineType lineType, SVGGColor color, int lineWidth) {
00222         SVGGLine* l = new SVGGLine;
00223 
00224         l->x1         = x1;
00225         l->y1         = y1;
00226         l->x2         = x2;
00227         l->y2         = y2;
00228         l->lineType   = lineType;
00229         l->lineWidth  = lineWidth;
00230         l->color      = color;
00231 
00232         if (fabs(x1) > maxX) maxX = fabs(x1);
00233         if (fabs(x2) > maxX) maxX = fabs(x2);
00234         if (fabs(y1) > maxY) maxY = fabs(y1);
00235         if (fabs(y2) > maxY) maxY = fabs(y2);
00236 
00237         this->ListAdd(l);
00238     }
00239 
00240     void AddRectangle(float x, float y, float width, float height, SVGGLineType lineType, SVGGColor areaColor, SVGGColor lineColor, int lineWidth) {
00241         SVGGRectangle* l = new SVGGRectangle;
00242 
00243         l->x         = x;
00244         l->y         = y;
00245         l->width     = width;
00246         l->height    = height;
00247         l->lineType  = lineType;
00248         l->lineWidth = lineWidth;
00249         l->lineColor = lineColor;
00250         l->areaColor = areaColor;
00251 
00252         if (fabs(x) > maxX) maxX = fabs(x);
00253         if (fabs(width) > maxX) maxX = fabs(width);
00254         if (fabs(y) > maxY) maxY = fabs(y);
00255         if (fabs(height) > maxY) maxY = fabs(height);
00256 
00257         this->ListAdd(l);
00258     }
00259 
00260     void Draw(StreamInterface &out) {
00261 
00262         float XFactor = 100.0 / maxX;
00263         float YFactor = 100.0 / maxY / 2;
00264 
00265 
00266         out.Printf("<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"iso-8859-1\" standalone=\"no\"?>\n");
00267         out.Printf("<!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC \"-//W3C//DTD SVG 1.0//EN\" \"http://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/DTD/svg10.dtd\">\n");
00268         out.Printf("<svg xmlns:xlink=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink\" xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\" width=\"%d\" height=\"%d\" viewBox=\"0 0 120 120\">\n", xSize, ySize);
00269         out.Printf("<g transform=\"translate(10,10)\">\n");
00270 
00271         if(grid) {
00272             float f = 0.0;
00273             for (f=0.0; f<=100.0; f+=gridDensity) {
00274                 // X
00275                 out.Printf("<line x1=\"%f\" y1=\"0\" x2=\"%f\" y2=\"100\" stroke=\"gray\" stroke-width=\"0.1\"/>\n", f, f);
00276                 // Y
00277                 out.Printf("<line x1=\"0\" y1=\"%f\" x2=\"100\" y2=\"%f\" stroke=\"gray\" stroke-width=\"0.1\"/>\n", f, f);
00278             }
00279         }
00280 
00281         if(axes) {
00282             out.Printf("<line x1=\"0\" y1=\"0\" x2=\"0\" y2=\"100\" stroke=\"black\" stroke-width=\"1\"/>\n");
00283             out.Printf("<line x1=\"0\" y1=\"50\" x2=\"100\" y2=\"50\" stroke=\"black\" stroke-width=\"1\"/>\n");
00284 
00285             // X arrow
00286             out.Printf("<path d=\"M 100 48.5 L 100 51.5 L 102 50 L 100 48.5\" fill=\"black\" stroke=\"black\"/>\n");
00287             // Y arrow
00288             out.Printf("<path d=\"M -1.5 0 L 1.5 0 L 0 -2 L -1.5 0\" fill=\"black\" stroke=\"black\"/>\n");
00289 
00290             // Labels
00291             out.Printf("<text x=\"2\" y=\"53\" text-anchor=\"start\" font-family=\"monospace\" font-size=\"2\">0</text>\n");
00292             out.Printf("<text x=\"100\" y=\"53\" text-anchor=\"end\" font-family=\"monospace\" font-size=\"2\">%.1e</text>\n", maxX);
00293 
00294             out.Printf("<text x=\"2\" y=\"0\" text-anchor=\"start\" font-family=\"monospace\" font-size=\"2\">%.1e</text>\n", maxY);
00295             out.Printf("<text x=\"2\" y=\"100\" text-anchor=\"start\" font-family=\"monospace\" font-size=\"2\">%.1e</text>\n", -maxY);
00296 
00297             // Add labels to axes
00298             float f = 0.0;
00299             for (f=20.0; f<=80.0; f+=20.0) {
00300                 out.Printf("<text x=\"%f\" y=\"53\" text-anchor=\"middle\" font-family=\"monospace\" font-size=\"2\">%.1e</text>\n", f, f/XFactor);
00301                 out.Printf("<text x=\"2\" y=\"%f\" text-anchor=\"start\" font-family=\"monospace\" font-size=\"2\">%.1e</text>\n", f, (50.0 - f)/YFactor);
00302             }
00303 
00304 
00305         }
00306 
00307 
00308         int i;
00309         for (i=0; i<this->ListSize(); i++) {
00310             SVGGElementInterface* e = dynamic_cast<SVGGElementInterface*>(this->ListPeek(i));
00311             e->Draw(XFactor, YFactor, out);
00312         }
00313         out.Printf("</g>\n");
00314         out.Printf("</svg>\n");
00315     }
00316 
00317 };
00318 
00319 #endif /* SVGGRAPH_H_ */
